name: Onslaught Mega Pack
description: A comprehensive Onslaught (2002) themed package: Morph, Cycling + cycling triggers, tribal synergies (Cleric, Soldier, Wizard, Goblin, Beast, Zombie, Elf, Bird), fetchlands, type-changing ‘Mistform’-style effects, and the 'Words' replacement enchantment cycle. Includes fear and other era-relevant evergreen ability distributions.

Instant: Creatures of a type of your choice get +1/+1 until end of turn. Draw a card.
Prevent all damage that would be dealt this turn.
Choose a creature type. Target creature becomes that type [TYPECHANGE_DURATION]. Draw a card.
Sorcery: Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and enchantments.
Create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.
Return all enchantments to their owners’ hands.
Enchantment: {1}: The next time you would draw a card this turn, [WORDS_REPLACEMENT].
